title: Da Caoyuan Shang De Xiao Laoshu
synopsis: There are a group of lively and cute little mice on the prairie. They are the little country mouse Treviso, its parents Mr. Di and Mrs. Di, younger sister Beatty, and Treviso's cousin, the city little mouse Os Valley. They live together industriously and bravely, living in harmony with the rabbit Blauson, the duck Flip, and the frog Jeremiah, and together they fight against the intrusion of the fat cat Bisie and the weasel Sweeney.
background: aired in 1996. This anime won The 4th National Children’s TV "Golden Boy Award" and 1998 "China TV Golden Eagle Award"
